text: hi everyone today I will make Vietnamese
style craps in tamarind sauce cool and
may is super delicious but also very
easy to make so let's begin
[Music]
for this recipe you want to get the
freshest crabs possible if not you can
still buy frozen ones and Asian store
separate the claws and cut the body into
halves you want to slightly crack the
claw so that the sauce camp and a trace
into the meat later I wrapped it in
paper towel so that the shell won't fly
to my face then quickly deep fry until
its turn orange you can use a small
saucepan or a mini deep fryer like this
this step helps to make the Kratt need
to get firmer for the sauce you will
need tamarine which is a very sour fruit
you can buy this at Asian store dissolve
one chunk in modding hot water you can
boil it on medium heat and you are spoon
to prick it then you will get a liquid
like this strain it through a sieve and
you will get tamarind juice we're gonna
use just 5 tbsp of the truth you can
freeze the rest in ice cube tray you use
for other sweet and sour dishes in a
large bowl mixing tamarind juice sugar
the tablespoon of cornstarch or tapioca
starch 2 to 3 tbsp of fish sauce to your
taste 2 TSP chicken stock and 2/3 cup of
water stir really well to dissolve next
in a large sauce pan or wok add in 1
tablespoon of cooking oil and saute add
3 tbsp of minced garlic and feel
fragrant give it a good toss of the
crabs is well infused with garlic
10 cloves of minced garlic that's a lot
but just me you really need that much
then pouring the sauce mixture and
stirred up the sauce will get thicker as
it cooks
adding one large onion would I have cut
into wedges stir for about one to three
minutes and we are done the sweet sour
and savory tomato sauce penetrates into
the crabmeat
making this dish really mouth-watering
finally garnish with some chopped spring
onion and cilantro some ground pepper
chilies and maybe some more fried
shallots on top you know whatever is
good tel piece of crispy pockets and dip
into that sauce mmm it's heavenly good
that's it for today I hope you like it
and thank you for watching bye bye
[Music]
